sentences.en: a spray-on water repellent for shoes
He became rebarbative and prickly and spiteful; I find his obsequiousness repellent.
sentences.cn: 他变得令人讨厌、易发怒,怀有恶意; 我发现他的奉承令人厌恶.

sentences.en: His ugly face was repellent to her.
sentences.cn: 他的丑陋面孔使她产生反感.

sentences.en: In common with such sculpture, some of Poe's stories leave us indifferent, or seem repellent.
sentences.cn: 坡的一些短篇,遭遇一如此等雕塑, 已经为人所蔑视, 甚至令人厌倦.

sentences.en: Many of these products are toxic to animals and other plants, or at least repellent.
sentences.cn: 这些产物的大多数对于动物和其它植物是有毒的, 或者至少是有驱避作用的.

sentences.en: Oaths and vile language of any sort had always been repellent to me.
sentences.cn: 无论哪一种咒骂和卑污的语言,我一向都讨厌的.

sentences.en: Rub some of this mosquito - repellent on your legs.
sentences.cn: 你在腿上搽点驱蚊剂吧.
她觉得他的长相很讨厌。

sentences.en: She still found the place repellent.
sentences.cn: 她还是觉得这个地方令人厌恶。

sentences.en: Textiles are made repellent to withstand the stresses of use and of the environment.
sentences.cn: 纺织品要做成能抗拒使用过程中各种应力的作用和周围环境的种种侵袭.

sentences.en: The growth of in-flight advertising "is repellent to these passengers" — an "insult" to paying customers, he says.
sentences.cn: 飞行中广告的增长“乘客对这些广告是排斥的” – 是对一个付费用户的“不尊重”，他说。

sentences.en: The idea of doing that is repellent to him.
sentences.cn: 一想到做那种事他就恶心.

sentences.en: Their political ideas are repellent to most people.
sentences.cn: 他们的政治观点令大多数人反感。

sentences.en: They sprayed aerosol insect repellent into the faces of police.
sentences.cn: 他们将喷雾驱虫剂喷在了警察的脸上.

sentences.en: Why This Works: Talcum powder, an ingredient in both chalk and baby powder, is a natural ant repellent.
sentences.cn: 为何如此：滑石粉是粉笔和婴儿爽身粉的组分之一，它是天然的蚂蚁排斥物。

words.tran_cn: [化学]排斥的；[助剂]防水的；弹回的；令人讨厌的

trans.tran_cn: 拒人于排斥的，千里之外的，令人厌恶的，防水的，相斥的
反拨力，排拒力，防水布，防水剂，驱虫剂，消肿药
